profile:
COVID-19 Precautions
These precautions include:

We are fully equipped with masks and shields and wear them as required.
Our fleet of trucks is fully equipped with hand sanitizer which our employees use as often as possible throughout the day.
In between jobs we also sanitize all our equipment.
The team wears gloves while working at your home.
We are introducing a NEW window cleaning solution.
This will not only clean your windows but also sanitize them at the same time.
Our soft wash solution as always sanitizes and cleans your home at the same time.

A cleaning company is more than a truck and some equipment. It’s a team you trust and count on to get the job done right the first time. Free estimates, trained professionals, and top-tier equipment all locally owned and operated. 

We are Clear Ottawa and we’re glad you decided to stop by. We do what we our way, and we’re excited to show you what makes us great at it. Our team loves your property as much as you do. Our local, friendly, and professional team is eager to prove it to you.

We’ve been providing the Ottawa-Gatineau area with spectacular service for as long as we’ve been in business. Steady business has kept us both busy and happy, but what we have to say and offer continues to evolve all the same.

Whether you’re a homeowner, public servant, realtor, or small business: we’re ready for you. If you need cleaning solutions from qualified professionals, we want to hear from you.
products:

We also use proteam vacuums. This is the only vacuum manufacturer in the world that is a sponsor of the American Lung association. Their vacuums have such a high level of filtration that they actually promote clean air together.

profile:
Professional Windows, Eavestrough, & Siding Cleaning 
Our team is made up of skilled professionals we personally train to work both quickly and efficiently. We don’t cut any corners in the team we select or the services we offer. Our services are comprehensive and effective, so we leave your place looking spotless at prices you can afford. 
We take your specific needs under consideration, this is why we offer several packages ranging from basic to premium. We offer a diverse selection of services including window, eavestrough, and siding cleaning so we can consult your unique needs. 
Extra precaution is taken to make certain your property is cleaned properly and with the utmost care. All of the cleaning solutions use in our cleaning services are safe and environmentally friendly, so they don’t pose a danger to your pets or home garden. 
In addition to our quality services, we understand the importance of your safety and customer support. To ensure your comfort and satisfaction, we always screen and extensively train our experts, so you know you’re getting the best people we have to offer. 
Windows 
In our basic windows package, we’ll scrub your exterior windows from top to bottom. Every inch will be handwashed and squeegeed, our cleaning also includes both dust and cobweb removal. 
The deluxe windows package includes the previously mentioned basic services, but with both your interior and exterior windows thoroughly cleaned. Your frames, screens, and ledges will also be wiped down. 
The premium windows package includes the previously mentioned basic and deluxe services, but with the added bonus of having your channels and tracks cleaned too. This ensures your windows both look and function at their best. 
The premium plus windows package is a specially curated package for larger scaled storm windows. This includes all the previously mentioned services for both the interior and exterior of your storm windows, so they keep you safe and remain well maintained. 
Eavestroughs 
Our basic eavestroughs package entails scanning your eavestroughs to pinpoint and dislodge clogs. This includes removing any dirt, shingles, leaves, or excess materials that may have gotten stuck in your gutters. 
Our deluxe eavestroughs package includes the same services in our basic package with additional precautions to ensure debris and downspouts are cleared. This package goes above and beyond to ensure your eavestroughs are flushed and fully functional. 
Our premium eavestroughs package includes both the basic and deluxe services. However, we’ll also take the extra step of scrubbing the exterior of the eavestroughs, so they enhance the overall image and appeal of your house. 
Sidings
The sidings of your home can attract dirt and other stains which can build up over time. Our cleaning service ensures we’ll go through your entire house exterior and remove as much debris as possible. 
Our siding and trim cleaning service entail handwashing and scrubbing all the dirt and stains on the surface of your home’s exterior. This is essential to ensuring your home retains its original shine, so our experts always go the extra mile to meet your expectations.
name: WindowGuru Inc.
